feature.label: Riena Samples (with source)
feature.description: This feature contains the corresponding components for Riena Samples that is intended to be added to target platforms at development time. It also requires Equinox SDK and RCP SDK and Riena Core SdK to resolve all dependencies. DONT INSTALL into your Eclipse IDE. Only install into your target platform.
